alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Greene; Madison; Miami; Montgomery (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 1:19AM EDT until April 01 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Champaign County in west central Ohio... Clark County in west central Ohio... Northern Greene County in west central Ohio... Northeastern Montgomery County in west central Ohio... Western Madison County in central Ohio... Southeastern Miami County in west central Ohio... * Until 200 AM EDT. * At 118 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of St. Paris to near Northridge, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Dayton, Springfield, Kettering, Beavercreek, Huber Heights, Fairborn, London, New Carlisle, Oakwood, Yellow Springs, Wright-Patterson Afb, Northridge, Cedarville, Enon, South Charleston, Mechanicsburg, Choctaw Lake, Brown, Riverside and Harmony. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 37 and 75. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for west central Ohio.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Clark; Greene; Madison; Miami; Montgomery
